Tomato___Tomato_Yellow_Leaf_Curl_Virus.english: Remove and destroy infected plants. Use resistant varieties. Control whiteflies with appropriate insecticides.
Tomato___Tomato_Yellow_Leaf_Curl_Virus.kiswahili: Ondoa na kuharibu mimea iliyoambukizwa. Tumia aina sugu. Dhibiti nzi weupe kwa dawa za wadudu zinazofaa.

Tomato___Late_blight.english: Apply fungicides like chlorothalonil or copper-based sprays. Remove infected plant parts and avoid overhead irrigation.
Tomato___Late_blight.kiswahili: Tumia dawa za kuua fangasi kama chlorothalonil au dawa za msingi wa shaba. Ondoa sehemu zilizoathirika na epuka umwagiliaji wa juu.

Tomato___healthy.english: No action required. Continue good agricultural practices to maintain plant health.
Tomato___healthy.kiswahili: Hakuna hatua inayohitajika. Endelea na mbinu bora za kilimo kudumisha afya ya mimea.

Tomato___Bacterial_spot.english: Use copper-based sprays to manage the disease. Avoid working in wet fields and rotate crops with non-host plants.
Tomato___Bacterial_spot.kiswahili: Tumia dawa za msingi wa shaba kudhibiti ugonjwa. Epuka kufanya kazi kwenye mashamba yenye unyevu na badilisha mazao na mimea isiyoathirika.

Tomato___Tomato_mosaic_virus.english: Remove and destroy infected plants. Wash hands and tools thoroughly before handling healthy plants.
Tomato___Tomato_mosaic_virus.kiswahili: Ondoa na kuharibu mimea iliyoambukizwa. Osha mikono na zana vizuri kabla ya kushughulikia mimea yenye afya.

Tomato___Leaf_Mold.english: Ensure proper air circulation by spacing plants. Apply fungicides like mancozeb or chlorothalonil.
Tomato___Leaf_Mold.kiswahili: Hakikisha mzunguko wa hewa wa kutosha kwa kupangilia nafasi ya mimea. Tumia dawa za kuua fangasi kama mancozeb au chlorothalonil.

Tomato___Spider_mites Two-spotted_spider.english: Spray plants with water to reduce mite populations. Use miticides or introduce predatory mites for biological control.
Tomato___Spider_mites Two-spotted_spider.kiswahili: Nyunyizia mimea maji kupunguza idadi ya chawa. Tumia dawa za kuua chawa au leta chawa wanaokula wadudu kwa udhibiti wa kibiolojia.

Tomato___Early_blight.english: Apply fungicides like azoxystrobin or chlorothalonil. Remove infected leaves and practice crop rotation.
Tomato___Early_blight.kiswahili: Tumia dawa za kuua fangasi kama azoxystrobin au chlorothalonil. Ondoa majani yaliyoathirika na tumia mzunguko wa mazao.

Tomato___Target_Spot.english: Use fungicides like mancozeb or copper-based sprays. Maintain good field hygiene by removing debris.
Tomato___Target_Spot.kiswahili: Tumia dawa za kuua fangasi kama mancozeb au dawa za msingi wa shaba. Dumisha usafi mzuri wa shamba kwa kuondoa uchafu.

Tomato___Septoria_leaf_spot.english: Remove infected leaves and avoid overhead irrigation. Apply fungicides such as chlorothalonil or copper-based sprays.
Tomato___Septoria_leaf_spot.kiswahili: Ondoa majani yaliyoathirika na epuka umwagiliaji wa juu. Tumia dawa za kuua fangasi kama chlorothalonil au dawa za msingi wa shaba.
